title: SEEK Job Listing
description: Defines the data structure for a scraped job listing from SEEK.

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the job listing.

company_name.description: The name of the hiring company. Can be null for private advertisers.

company_url.description: The URL to the company's profile on SEEK.

location.description: The primary location of the job.

job_url.description: The canonical URL for the job listing on SEEK.

scraped_at.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp when the data was scraped.

work_type.description: The type of employment (e.g., Full Time, Part Time).

salary_range.description: The salary range provided for the job.

job_description_html.description: The full job description in HTML format.

post_date.description: The date the job was posted.
